action.primary: Clears Heat, resolves toxicity, generates fluids and improves the condition of the throat

indications: Sore throat due to Win-Heat Invasion or Heat Toxin Accumulation

Dry, parched mouth and throat with irritability, thirst hoarseness, coughing with sticky sputum (fresh made into a paste), epilepsy, polydipsia, hematemesis with coughing, bacillary dysentery, fugutoxin

contraindications: This herb may make pox or acne emerge.

useCases: Apply topically as a powder for sore throat from Wind-Heat or Heat Toxin
Dray, parched throat with a raspy voice

notes: This herb unbinds the Stomach and descends Qi and halts diarrhea.
Make a soup from the flesh of ten olives to relieve drunkenness.
It is said that chewing and swallowing the juice resolves all toxins from fish and tortoises.
It can resolve fish bones stuck in the throat.
